data.name: Winged Sakura: Endless Dream - Art Collection
data.detailed_description:
This DLC downloads the 'Art' folder onto Winged Sakura: Endless Dream's main directory.

Warning: Most of these images can be found and acquired for free by playing the game. This is only for those who wish to provide additional support and would like to see and collect additional art.

The 'Art' folder contains the following:

Wallpapers

Each .zip files contain 43 .png images. 5 of the 43 images contain only facial expression change. 38 images are unique.


1920x1080.zip
1920x1200.zip
3840x2160.zip
3840x2400.zip

The 4k resolution images (3840x2160 or 3840x2400) are the art's native resolution. 1920x1080 and 1920x1200 are downscaled from the 4k resolution images.

4k resolution images cannot be acquired from in-game as the game only supports 1080p.

Extra

Extra.zip contains 14 .png images. 13 images are uncut (images that were cropped in-game because they do not fit on screen.) As a bonus, we have also included a 'WSMA' folder containing CGs of Winged Sakura: Mindy's Arc at 4k resolutions (3840x2160 only) and a 5028x6660 poster of Winged Sakura: Mindy's Arc title screen that we've never managed to officially use.


  • 1 transparent image of Winged Sakura: Endless Dream's logo
  • 12 images at 3840x4800 pixels. The 12 images contain uncut art from 12 CGs. See below for the 12 CGs.
  • 1 image of our title screen at 3840x3840
  • 9 CG images at 3840x2160 of Winged Sakura: Mindy's Arc
  • 1 poster size image at 5028x6660 of Winged Sakura: Mindy's Arc

The 12 images at 3840x4800 pixels are listed below:

1. Luciella
2. Lila
3. Elva
4. Haley
5. Mocha
6. Claire
7. Jessi
8. Monica
9. Lola
10. Serah
11. Luna
12. Cecilia

Thank you for your support.

data.short_description: This DLC downloads the 'Art' folder onto Winged Sakura: Endless Dream's main directory.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 1250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Any computer that can unzip .zip files and open .png files. Files are for personal use only and is intended to be used as a wallpaper or for collection.

Minimum:

  • Additional Notes: Any computer that can unzip .zip files and open .png files. Files are for personal use only and is intended to be used as a wallpaper or for collection.
